captions.text: Stop the bus! Stop the bus!

If this bus drives slower
than 50 miles per hour

- Wait, does that mean I'm
running over 50 miles per hour?

You gotta be the fastest man
in the world.

- You gotta help me, man!
What do I do?
- You got some real talent, kid.

You gotta set some goals for
yourself and reach 'em.

You got your whole life
ahead of you.
Don't let nobody hold you down.

title: Waiting for the Bus - Cyanide & Happiness Shorts
